Reviews.Title: small and light
Reviews.Author: robin hilliard
Reviews.Content: nice camera… it replaced a D60. the lens off of the D60 weighed about the same as the new camera so its a lot easier to use. pictures are not as good as the old one but this one didn't cost $5000. i would recommend  this camera to anyone especially to one starting out or to older users. its really light and small.

Reviews.Title: component list
Reviews.Author: Frank Frankowski
Reviews.Content: Did not list all components.Very good deal.Wife loved camera, smaller in size than the big brother t5i model.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera! And great package. Fast shipping. Could not be happier. I recommend this for anyone looking for a great digital SLR.
